text:
SACC has done a great job helping me and all the sister survivors in the Trust Yoga saga. From the legal clinics to counselling sessions, all the staff involved have been very sensitive and understanding of our trauma and difficulties. We are truly grateful for the help.

If possible, it would be good for the SACC to offer subsidized therapy as healing from trauma requires deeper work with the psyche of each individual.

i felt believed, i felt safe, i felt this was a space that had my back and not in a small way but in a 'we're actually here with you' way. they came to report with me, they offered legal clinic and counseling, they followed up even when i couldn't reply as much cos of mental health. very grateful.
